sailpoint.object

Interface Classifiable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bundle, ManagedAttribute

    public interface Classifiable
    Interface for objects that support Classifications

    • Method Summary

      default void updateClassificationsBySource(java.util.Set<Classification> updates, java.lang.String source, boolean effective)
      Update ObjectClassifications based on set of Classifications - Removes all preexisting ObjectClassifications with a specific Source that are not present in the set of Classifications passed in.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassifications

        java.util.List<ObjectClassification> getClassifications()
        Get all the classifications for the object
        Returns:
        List of Classificaitons

      • setClassifications

        void setClassifications(java.util.List<ObjectClassification> classifications)
        Set the classifications on the object
        Parameters:
        classifications - List of Classifications

      • addClassification

        boolean addClassification(ObjectClassification classification)
        Add a single Classification to the object. If the Classification already exists, there should be no modification.
        Parameters:
        classification - Classification object
        Returns:
        True if the new Classification was added to the list, otherwise false.

      • removeClassification

        boolean removeClassification(ObjectClassification classification)
        Remove a single Classification from the object. If the Classification does not already exist, there should be no modification.
        Parameters:
        classification - Classification object
        Returns:
        True if the Classification was removed from the list, otherwise false.

      • getClassificationDisplayNames

        default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClassificationDisplayNames()
        Return a list of display names of the classifications for this object.
        Returns:
        List of display names of each classification

        default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClassificationNames()

      • addClassification

        default boolean addClassification(Classification classification,
                                  java.lang.String source,
                                  boolean effective)
        Parameters:
        classification - - Classification to associate
        source - - Source of the Classification Assignment
        effective - - True if this is an effective Classification, false if direct
        Returns:

      • removeClassification

        default boolean removeClassification(Classification c)
        Remove all ObjectClassifications reference the classification c
        Parameters:
        c - - Classification to remove
        Returns:

      • updateClassificationsBySource

        default void updateClassificationsBySource(java.util.Set<Classification> updates,
                                           java.lang.String source,
                                           boolean effective)
        Update ObjectClassifications based on set of Classifications - Removes all preexisting ObjectClassifications with a specific Source that are not present in the set of Classifications passed in. - Add ObjectClassifications that did not previously exist for Classifications in the set passed in.
        Parameters:
        updates - - Set of Classification objects to associate
        source - - Source of all of the Classification assignments
        effective - - True if these are an effective Classification assignments, false if direct

      • removeClassificationsBySource

        default void removeClassificationsBySource(java.lang.String source)
